caption: Elara's winter lecture in the frost-dusted lecture hall glows with soft sunlight as she leans forward, her breath visible in the chill, to scribble equations on the fogged glass board. Her body-hugging dress whispers against her curves, and a teasing smile plays on her lips as she locks eyes with a student. ❄️💖 #UniversityGlam #SexyTeacher #WinterCharm #AcademicSeduction
